p: The Vespucci grapevine transcriptomic compendium ( Moretto et al., 2016) available at http://vitis.colombos.fmach.it/, is composed by 29,090 genes and 1,565 contrasts, which refer to the comparisons of condition vs. reference within each experiment. The pre-processing procedure comprised three steps: (1) removal of contrasts with more than 55% of missing values; (2) removal of genes with more than 55% of missing values; (3) for each gene, replacement of the remaining missing values with the median of its contrasts values. This procedure reduced the original dataset to 28,013 genes and 701 contrasts ( Supplementary Table S1 ).
